statements: DELETE FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE weather_id = 100 AND vegetation_health < 0.5;
DELETE FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE satellite_image_id = 100 AND weather_id = 1
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE weather_location = 'New York' AND temperature > 80;
DELETE FROM satellite_image_data WHERE image_location = 'Paris' AND vegetation_health_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 10 OR precipitation > 50;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM data_join WHERE image_id = 100 AND health_id = 200;
